name: Exotic Indian Eats
text:
MAIN COURSE
VEG
Paneer Tikka Masala
Grilled paneer cubes simmered in a rich and creamy tomato-based tikka masala sauce. 18.99
Methi Chaman
Creamy North Indian curry with choice of paneer, green peas, fenugreek leaves miled spiced, luscious cashew sauce. 18.99
Kadhai Paneer
Paneer sautéed with onions, bell peppers, and spices in a traditional kadhai masala. 18.99
Dal Makhani
Slow-cooked black lentils in butter, cream, and mild spices for a rich, hearty dish. 18.99
Paneer Lababdar
Paneer cubes in a luscious tomato-cashew gravy with a touch of cream and spice. 18.99
Palak Paneer
Creamy spinach purée blended with paneer cubes and mild Indian spices. 18.99
Masala Gravy Chap
Soya chaap simmered in a rich and spicy North Indian-style masala gravy. 18.99
Chole Bhature/Poori (2)
Spicy chickpea curry served with fluffy bhature or crispy pooris. 18.99
Matar Paneer
Paneer and green peas cooked together in a mildly spiced tomato-onion gravy. 18.99
Malai Kofta
Soft paneer and potato dumplings in a rich, creamy cashew-tomato sauce. 18.99
CHICKEN
Chicken Ghee Roast
A fiery South Indian specialty with chicken roasted in ghee and a blend of red chilies and spices. 19.99
Butter Chicken
Tender tandoori chicken simmered in a creamy, buttery tomato-based gravy. 19.99
Andhra Style Chicken Curry (Bone-in)
Spicy and flavorful chicken curry made with traditional Andhra spices. 19.99
Chicken Tikka Masala
Char-grilled chicken tikka cooked in a rich, spiced tomato-onion gravy. 18.99
Kadai Chicken
Chicken sautéed with bell peppers, onions, and ground spices in tomato gravy. 19.99
Peshawari Chicken
Northwestern-style chicken minced curry with chicken pieces cooked in aromatic spices and onion tomato base. 19.99
Vindaloo Chicken/Lamb/Goat
Soft paneer and potato dumplings in a rich, creamy cashew-tomato sauce. 18.99/19.99/23.99
Saag Chicken
Chicken cooked in a creamy spinach gravy with mild spices. 19.99
TANDOOR
VEG
Paneer Angara
Smoky, spicy paneer cubes char-grilled, with mix of Aromatic Indian spices and yogurt. 17.99
Awadhi Paneer
Paneer cubes char-grilled, with mix of Aromatic Indian spices, yogurt, Cheese cream and Cashew Paste. 17.99
Dahi Ke Sholey
Crispy golden bread pockets stuffed with spicy hung curd and herbs. 17.99
Tandoori Masala Chap
Soya chap marinated in bold masala and chargrilled to smoky perfection. 17.99
Tandoori Malai Chap
Creamy, mildly spiced soya chap marinated with cashew and cheese cream and char-grilled to perfection. 18.99
Tandoori Veg Momos
Paneer-filled dumplings marinated in tandoori masala and grilled to perfection. 16.99
NON-VEG
Lahori Chicken Tikka
Juicy chicken pieces marinated in traditional Lahori spices and grilled to smoky perfection. 18.99
Tandoori Chicken (Half/Full)
Classic bone-in chicken marinated in spiced yogurt and roasted in a clay oven. 20.99/31.99
Reshmi Seekh kebab
Melt-in-the-mouth minced chicken kebabs infused with Indian aromatic spices. 19.99
Chicken Malai Tikka
Tender chicken cubes marinated in a rich blend of Cashew paste, cream, cheese, and mild spices. 19.99
Hariyali Chicken Tikka
Succulent chicken infused with fresh mint, coriander, and green chili marinade. 17.99
GOAT/SEA FOOD
Tandoori Prawns
King prawns marinated in spiced yogurt and tandoor-roasted for a smoky, flavorful bite. 22.99
Mutton Seekh kebab
Juicy minced mutton skewers seasoned with traditional spices and grilled to perfection. 21.99
Tawa Fish
Soya chap marinated in bold masala and chargrilled to smoky perfection. 20.99
APPETIZERS
VEG
Samosa (2)
Crispy golden pastry stuffed with spiced potato and peas. 6.99
Samosa Chaat
Crushed samosas topped with chutneys, yogurt, onions, and spices for a tangy treat. 9.99
Crispy Corn
Crisp-fried corn kernels tossed in garlic, chilies, and aromatic spices. 13.99
NON-VEG
Chicken Dynamite
Crispy fried chicken tossed in a fiery, tangy dynamite sauce. 19.99
Pepper Chicken
Batter fried bone-less chicken tossed with onion bell peppers and bold black pepper sauce. 19.99
Drums of Heaven
Juicy chicken lollipops tossed and served with semi-gravy. 20.99
Karivepaku Chicken
Flavorful chicken cooked with fresh curry leaves and South Indian spices. 19.99
Dragon Chicken
Spicy Indo-Chinese chicken stir-fried with peppers and garlic sauce. 19.99
SEAFOOD
Apollo Fish
Crispy fried fish tossed in a tangy and spicy Apollo-style sauce. 20.99
Chilli Fish
Crispy fish fillets stir-fried in a spicy Indo-Chinese chili sauce. 20.99
Fish Kasundi Tikka
Fish chunks marinated in a zesty mustard-based Kasundi sauce and grilled to perfection. 20.99
Loose Prawns
Crispy golden prawns tossed in Indo-Chinese spices and herbs for a bold flavor punch. 13.99
Butter Garlic Prawns
Succulent prawns sautéed in a rich buttery garlic sauce. 21.99
Amritsari Fish Pakora
Basa fish fillets coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried. 20.99
INDO CHINESE
ALL FRIED RICE AND NOODLE ITEMS ARE AVAILABLE IN VEG/EGG/CHICKEN 16.99/17.99/19.99
Chilli Paneer
Paneer cubes in a spicy, tangy chili garlic sauce with bell peppers and onions. 18.99
Chilli Chicken
Boneless chicken cooked in a fiery chili-soy sauce with onions and peppers. 19.99
Veg Manchurian
Vegetable balls simmered in a bold soy-garlic Manchurian sauce. 18.99
Chicken Manchurian
Crispy chicken in a rich and spicy Indo-Chinese Manchurian sauce. 19.99
Noodles
Stir-fried Hakka noodles with your choice of vegetables, egg, or chicken.
Pan Fried Noodles
Crispy noodles topped with savory vegetable or chicken stir-fry in garlic sauce.
Schezwan Noodles
Spicy noodles tossed in fiery Shezwan sauce with vegetables, egg, or chicken
Fried Rice
Wok-tossed rice with vegetables, egg, or chicken in Indo-Chinese spices.
Schezwan Fried Rice
Chili-garlic fried rice in spicy Shezwan sauce with vegetables, egg, or chicken.
GOAT/SEAFOOD
Lamb Rogan Josh
Slow-cooked lamb in a rich Kashmiri-style curry with aromatic spices and yogurt. 23.99
Goat Curry
Bone-in goat simmered in a traditional onion-tomato masala with bold Indian spices. 23.99
Malabar Fish Curry
Coastal-style fish curry with coconut, curry leaves, and a hint of tamarind. 19.99
Prawn Ghee Roast
Succulent prawns roasted in ghee with a fiery blend of red chilies and Mangalorean spices. 23.99
EXOTIC BREADS
Rumali Roti
Soft, smoky, handkerchief-thin flatbread—perfect with any curry or wrap. 3.99
Garlic Naan
Succulent prawns roasted in ghee with a fiery blend of red chilies and Mangalorean spices. 3.49
Butter Naan
Classic tandoori naan brushed generously with melted butter. 2.99
Roti
Whole wheat flatbread cooked on a griddle for a light, healthy option. 2.49
Lacha Paratha
Flaky, layered whole wheat paratha cooked with ghee for a crispy finish. 3.99
Kulcha
Stuffed tandoori bread with mildly spiced potatoes and herbs. 5.99
Keema Stuffed Naan
Naan filled with flavorful minced meat and baked in the tandoor. 6.99
Cheese Garlic Naan
Indulgent naan stuffed with cheese and topped with garlic and cilantro. 5.99
EXOTIC DOSAS
Plain Dosa
Crispy golden rice crepe served with coconut chutney and sambar. 13.99
Masala Dosa
Crispy dosa filled with spiced mashed potato, served with chutney and sambar. 15.99
Onion Dosa
Thin rice crepe topped with finely chopped onions and mild spices. 15.99
Ravva Dosa
Thin, lacy semolina-based dosa with a crispy texture and subtle spice. 15.99
Paneer Dosa
Stuffed dosa with spiced grated paneer for a rich and hearty twist. 16.99
Cheese Dosa
Crispy dosa loaded with melted cheese for a fusion-style delight. 16.99
Uthappam
Soft, thick rice pancake topped with mixed fine chopped onions and green chilli. 15.99
BIRYANI'S
NON-VEG
Chicken Dum Biryani
Classic Hyderabadi-style biryani with bone-in chicken slow-cooked in layers of aromatic rice. 19.99
Fry Piece Chicken Biryani
Fragrant biryani with spiced fried chicken pieces layered over basmati rice. 19.99
Special Boneless Chicken Biryani
Boneless chicken thigh cooked with aromatic spices and layered in dum biryani style. 19.99
Spl Prawn Biryani
Juicy prawns layered in fragrant basmati rice with coastal-style biryani spices. 23.99
VEG
Kaju Paneer Biryani
Fried paneer combined with in-house special spice mix and short basmati rice. 17.99
Paneer 65 Dum Biryani
Flavorful dum biryani with spicy fried paneer 65 tossed in fragrant basmati rice. 17.99
PULAO'S
Prawn Pulao
Fragrant rice cooked with spiced prawns and herbs for a coastal twist. 23.99
Mutton Pulao
Tender mutton simmered with aromatic rice, whole spices, and ghee. 23.99
Chicken Fry Piece Pulao
Seasoned rice paired with crispy fried chicken pieces for a flavorful meal. 19.99
Chicken Ghee Roast Pulao
Spicy chicken ghee roast served over mildly spiced rice cooked with whole spices. 19.99
WRAP'S & BURGERS
Chicken Tikka Wrap
Grilled chicken tikka, fresh veggies, and sauces wrapped in warm flatbread. 11.99
Paneer Tikka Wrap
Spiced paneer tikka with crisp veggies and chutneys rolled in a soft wrap. 10.99
Seekh Kebab Wrap
Juicy minced meat seekh kebab with onions and sauces in a flavorful wrap. 12.99
Tandoori Chicken Burger
Grilled chicken served in a bun with lettuce, onions, and house sauce. 15.99
Aloo Tikki Burger
Crispy potato patty with chutneys and veggies in a toasted burger bun. 8.99
DESSERTS
Rasmalai
Soft cottage cheese patties soaked in saffron-flavored creamy milk. 6.99
Shahi Tukda
Crispy fried bread soaked in sweetened milk and garnished with nuts. 7.99
Jalebi with Rabdi
Golden, crispy jalebis served with thick, chilled rabdi. 6.99
DRINKS
Mango Lassi 6.99
Masala Chai 2.99
Filter Coffee 2.99
Salt Lassi 5.99
Peda Lassi 5.99
Can Pops 2.99
Water Bottle 1.99
